definition: Ueno, district in Taitō Ward, Tokyo/Ueno (Japanese surname)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: A stylish couple walking through Ueno Park in Tokyo during sunset.
sentences.chinese: 一对时髦的夫妻傍晚时分穿过东京上野公园。

sentences.english: Now no longer this inscription ueno park and the symbol of the history of anchor.
sentences.chinese: 现在的上野公园再也没有该碑文和象征历史的锚了。

sentences.english: Congestion of refugees fleeing their homes in the Ueno vicinity in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 逃离家园的难民拥挤在东京上野附近。

sentences.english: Cattle and sheep drink at creeks, monkeys revel on rocks.
sentences.chinese: 涧边牛羊饮，石上野猿狂。

definition: to be out of (political) office/to be out of power
Nara, an old capital of Japan
Tokugawa, the ruling clan of Japan from 1550-1850
Kamakura city in Kanagawa prefecture 神奈川縣|神奈川县[Shen2 nai4 chuan1 xian4], Japan
Ōsaka, a city and prefecture in Japan
Asakusa, district of Tokyo with an atmosphere of old Japan, famous for the 7th century Buddhist temple, Sensō-ji
